channel.title: [delta] hail command [delta]
channel.description:
how do u make the ::hail command for a delta server?
the thing u do ::hail (username) then it says something like this "Omg its (username)! I thought i would never see him!"

item.title: [delta] hail command [delta]
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:
@Skorge wrote:

Add this void into your client.java

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p; //The specific player's client castOn.plrText = "Omg! It's "+playerName+"! I thought I'd never see him!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }

I feel like I don’t need to explain this at all, but then add this into your client.java

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("\"Your name, of course\"")){ hail(); }

Read full topic
